name: Kick The Puppet
description: Want to let off steam? This game is made for you ! Knives, submachine gun, flamethrower, tank ... Which method will you choose?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphique Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: All
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
